description: Identify the year with the highest national debt in relation to GDP.
Determine the national debt in relation to GDP for the year 2023.
Calculate the average national debt in relation to GDP from 2015 to 2025.
Find any year where the national debt in relation to GDP significantly deviates from the trend.
Is there an observable trend in the national debt in relation to GDP over the years?
List the years where the national debt in relation to GDP is above 0.45.
Arrange the years in ascending order based on their national debt in relation to GDP.
Identify the range of national debt in relation to GDP values from 2015 to 2025.
What percentage of the years have a national debt in relation to GDP below 0.4?
Identify clusters of years with similar national debt in relation to GDP values.
